AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if there are adequate resources for creating the data structures for the data items

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Create the data structures required for the data items and return 'success' if creation was successful

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Return 'success' if current values of data items can be initialized with their default values in zero logical execution time or else return 'success' if initialization of current value of data items has completed

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Start initialization of current values of data items with their default values and return 'success' if the initialization has completed

AP: Shutdown Action of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component

AP: Execution Procedure of Data Pool Component
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component

AP: Definition of Data Items in the Data Pool Component
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to access the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Operation to update the Current Value of a Data Item
DefValue: No default defined at framework level

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
Shutdown Action in Base Component of OutComponent

DefValue: Set equal to PUS service type
Set equal to PUS service sub-type
Build a packet with the layout specified by the PUS

AP: Operation to Report Invalid Destination of an OutComponent
Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if information for initializing InCommand using data in incoming packet is valid

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to initialize InCommand and return “action successful'

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if ipacket length and checksum are correct and if command parameters have legal values (the legality checks are specified for each individual command)

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to configure InCommand and return “action successful'
Release all resources allocated to the InCommand

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand

DefValue: Set equal to PUS service type
Set equal to PUS service sub-type

AP: Operation to Report Packet Destination Invalid by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Packet Re-Routing Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Failure by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Packet Acceptance Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Success by InLoader
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Progress Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Determine if a progress step has been completed and, if so, run the Command Progress Success Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Failure Procedure

AP: Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Run the Command Verification Success Procedure

AP: Destination Attribute of Service 1 Out-Going Report
DefValue: The destination is set to be equal to the source of the command being verified

AP: Acknowledge Level Attribute of Service 1 Out-Going Report
DefValue: All service 1 OutComponents are reports and therefore carry no acknowledge flags

AP: Discriminant Attribute of Service 1 Out-Going Report
DefValue: No discriminant attribute is defined for service 1 reports

AP: Parameter Attribute of Service 1 Out-Going Report
DefValue: Parameter values are as defined by the service 1 procedures called in adaptation points S1-1 to S1-9

AP: Enable Check Operation of Service 1 Out-Going Report
Ready Check Operation of Service 1 Out-Going Report
Repeat Check Operation of Service 1 Out-Going Report
Update Action of Service 1 Out-Going Report

DefValue: Retrieve (17,2) report from OutFactory and set action outcome to “success' if retrieval succeeds. If the retrieval fails, generate error report OUTFACTORY\_FAILED and set outcome of Start Action to 'failed'
Configure the (17,2) report with a destination equal to the source of the (17,1), load it in the OutLoader, and set action outcome to 'completed'

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for (17,1) Command

DefValue: The destination is set to be equal to the source of the (17,1) command which triggers the (17,2)
No discriminant attribute is defined for reports (17,2)
Run procedure Command (17,3) Start Action of figure \ref{fig:Cmd17s3Start}
Run procedure Command (17,3) Progress Action of figure \ref{fig:Cmd17s3Prgr}

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for (17,3) Command

DefValue: Command (17,3) carries one parameter representing the destination to which the (17,1) command must be sent
The destination is set to be equal to the source of the (17,3) command which triggers the (17,4)
No discriminant attribute is defined for reports (17,4)
